metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a Gur Hunter at the Gur Camp in Wyrm's Crossing
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur CampApproach the camp and talk to Gur Leader and the Entrance Guard.Click on this Gur Hunter.

0.speaker: Katelyn Lerskin
0.text: I pray you will succeed where we failed. Exterminate every last vampire parasite.

1.speaker: Katelyn Lerskin
1.text: You're talking to the wrong hunter. You need to see Ulma.

2.speaker: Katelyn Lerskin
2.text: Every last bloodsucker needs to be wiped from this plane.
